english.segment1: Your Word Oh Lord is eternal. It stands firm. Your faithfulness continues through all the earth. All creation hangs on your every word
english.segment2: (Chorus). With the sound of your voice. Water still, you are Lord over all. With the touch of your robe, the sick are healed. And for you Jesus we all fall down
english.segment3: My soul finds rest and comfort. From only you. My fortress and my rock. I won't be moved. You are my cornerstone, who's love endures
english.segment4: With the sound of your voice. Water still, you are Lord over all. With the touch of your robe, the sick are healed. And for you Jesus we all fall down
english.segment5: (Bridge). And I praise you for I am fearfully and wonderfully made. And I praise you for I am fearfully and wonderfully made
english.segment6: With the sound of your voice. Water still, you are Lord over all. With the touch of your robe, the sick are healed. Jesus we all fall down
english.segment7: Water sill, you are Lord over all. With the touch of your robe, the sick are healed. For you Jesus we all fall down
english.segment8: We fall down, we fall down
